name: 24S
description:
**24S** is owned by **LVMH**.

Bernard Arnault, the chairman and **CEO** of **LMVH** Moet Hennessy-Louis Vuitton, and the world's richest man according to Forbes, has **invested** in cybersecurity firm, **Wiz**, the **Israeli** maker of cloud security solutions for enterprises.[^1]

[^1]: https://www.timesofisrael.com/luxury-goods-magnate-bernard-arnault-invests-in-israeli-cybersecurity-firm-wiz/
